00018 #ifndef SORTABLETABLE_H
00019 #define SORTABLETABLE_H
00020 
00021 #include "array.h"
00022 #include "types.h"
00023 
00029 class SortableTable : public Array<dataType>{
00030   
00031 public: 
00032      inline SortableTable(){};
00033      inline ~SortableTable(){};
00034 
00040   inline void setSize(dataType nbOfColumns,bool twoRows = true){
00041     if(twoRows)Array<dataType>::setSize(2,nbOfColumns);
00042     else Array<dataType>::setSize(1,nbOfColumns);
00043   };
00044 
00046   SortableTable(const SortableTable& currentSortableTable);
00047   
00051   inline void sort(dataType rowToSort){
00052     if(rowToSort == 1) Quicksort(1, 2, 1, nbColumns);
00053     if(rowToSort == 2) Quicksort(2, 1, 1, nbColumns);
00054   };
00055 
00059   inline void sort(){Quicksort(1,nbColumns);};
00060 
00061   
00071   void subset(SortableTable& subsetTable,dataType row,dataType startColumn,dataType endColumn);
00072     
00073 private:
00074 
00075   inline void setSize(dataType nbOfRows, dataType nbOfColumns){};
00076 
00077   /*QuickSort algorithm.
00078   * To speed the sort, two sort algorithms are combined.
00079   * Quicksort() is used as the main algorithm, but when the subarrays get small enough,
00080   * we switch to an alternative, a selection sort.
00081   * The small enough is a value between 5 and 20.
00082   */
00083 
00084   void SelectionSort(dataType rowToSort,dataType secondRow, dataType left, dataType right);
00085   dataType Partition(dataType rowToSort,dataType secondRow, dataType left, dataType right);
00086   void Quicksort(dataType rowToSort,dataType secondRow, dataType left, dataType right);
00087 
00088   void SelectionSort(dataType left, dataType right);
00089   dataType Partition(dataType left, dataType right);
00090   void Quicksort(dataType left, dataType right);
00091   
00092   static const dataType kSMALL_ENOUGH;
00093 
00094 };
00095 
00096 #endif
